result.execSummary:
The defendant Norman Mason was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Norman Mason is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Norman Mason was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered, without further order of the court, against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

AODA and comply.
Counseling deemed appropriate by Probation Agent.

Ct 2. Dismissed.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Norman Mason

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Norman Mason in court with Atty Gary Dodge.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls @ 1:32 pm.  State gives plea agreement, Complied with victim rights, plea to ct 1,  ct 2 dismissed w/o prejudice, withheld sentence  1 year probation,  AODA & follow through, counseling, costs & 60 days jail. Defense free to argue.  Parties agree to plea agreement, ct 1 DC, Domestic, No contest, Plea advisement filed.  Def. advised of constitutional rights & J.T. rights. Court directs Clerk to enter plea into record. Allegations from complaint. Court finds probable cause & finds def Guilty. Ct 2 Dismissed w/o prejudice. State no longer recommending jail time.  Def. has nothing to say. 
Court orders withheld sentence 1 year probation, AODA & comply, counseling deemed appropriate by probation agent costs.  If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered, without further order of the court, against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt. Def. advised of postconviction rights. Bond applied to costs.

ADDRESS INFO for Norman Mason
Current: W7352 Hwy 47, Phlox, WI 54409   (Effective: 11-11-2014)
Prior: 719 7th Ave, Antigo, WI 54409

Defendant Norman Mason in court with attorney Jessica L Schuster.  Defendant Norman Mason in custody.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint received, reviewed and waive reading.  Time limits for preliminary waived.  Agreement to bond.  Court will reduce bond.  Status conference scheduled for December 15, 2014 at 03:30 pm.
